name: Cricket Heroes: Mobile Edition
description:
Your favourite arcade cricket game and simulator finally comes back to desktop from mobile! Tackle the most advanced AI in the most realistic and testing conditions.

Features include:

* 6 modes: Slog, T20, ODI and Tests, series and tournaments
* Career mode!
* comprehensive stats - review every ball delivered and every run scored
* 3rd umpire and a full decision review system
* dynamic weather and pitch conditions
* dynamic AI that responds intelligently to the match situation
* unique, easy-to-use control schemes for batting and bowling
* 20 different batting strokes
* global leaderboard
* achievements
* custom tournaments and series!

NOTE: this game requires a gamepad (ideally an Xbox360/One)

Slick Arcade Action

Simple, intuitive controls with gamepad support. Pickup-and-play action!

Realistic Simulation

Simulate every ball in detail, including weather, pitch and ball conditions. Generate match reports, scorecards and ESPNCrincinfo-style statistics. 

Career Mode & Leaderboard

Start your journey as a promising teenager in a club team. Set up training schedules, purchase equipment, win sponsorships and adoration...BECOME A LEGEND!

Comprehensive Game Modes

Play T20, ODI, tests, 5 over slogs and Beach Cricket. Set up leagues, series and tournaments and become a champion.
